邪惡勝出之唯一必要條件乃是善良者的不作爲

"The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing."

—Edmund Burke (in a letter addressed to Thomas Mercer).

《紐約時報》上的文章「中国的长臂：滕彪审视西方机构对华自我审查」正是 Edmund Burke 警告在我們這個時代的體現。

全文：https://cn.nytimes.com/china/20180619/teng-biao-china-censorship/
